heading: IGW415I SMSVSAM SERVER ADDRESS SPACE HAS FAILED AND IS RESTARTING
content:
Explanation

  The SMSVSAM Server address space has terminated, and the system will
  now attempt to restart it. Until the restart is successful, RLS
  access for VSAM data sets is not available.

  System action

  The system is attempting to restart the address space.

  Operator response

  Tell the system programmer that the address space has failed.

  System programmer response

  Provide the IBM Support Center with SYS1.LOGREC and SYS1.DUMPnn.

  Source

  DFSMSdfp

  Module

  IDAVSINI

  Routing code

  2,10

  Descriptor code
